name: Defined - faldo:ExactPosition
description: Event occurs on position specified by position_one

name: Range - faldo:InRangePosition
description: Event occurs on a peptide between position_one (start) and position_two (end)

name: Alternative - faldo:OneOfPosition
description: Event occurs on position_one OR position_two

name: Connected
description: Event occurs on position_one AND position_two

name: Unknown - faldo:FuzzyPosition
description: No position information available for the event
